page.title: 14ABERDOUR PAGEANT
page.content: The children in the other{P.7}in our school have just taken part in a {pageant}in{Aberdour.}The{pageant}was a play performed by{3}schools,{Dalgety {Bay Primary,Aberdour Primary}and {Donibristle Primary.}The children from the schools dressed up as people who lived in{Aberdour Castle}in the early {17th}century.They dressed up as {falconers,servants,messengers}and {Lords}and{Ladies.}They performed a play about how people lived at that time.They sung songs and danced. Even the servants performed. The children all made their own costumes to look like dress from that period. It was arranged by two hisorians,{Mr and Mrs {Bagenal}who have been going round other schools in{Fife}doing similar projects.
